title: Social Studies Microlearning Design Through Mobile Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Understanding of Fundamental Social Science Concepts
context.additional_context: Personalized feedback provision through a learning data collection/management system in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to operate a personalized social studies content recommendation system using learning data.
Visualize learner engagement patterns and develop improvement strategies through analytical tools.
Design a formative assessment system based on learning log data collectible in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
